article.title: Raytheon Receives Air Traffic Navigation Contract
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Air Traffic Navigation Integration Coordination System

article.text: Raytheon Company, Marlborough, Massachusetts, was awarded a more than $19 million contract for the program management and engineering services relating to the Air Traffic Navigation Integration Coordination System hardware and the radio retrofitting project.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
